message.content:
{"id": "7330", 
"title": "Make more actions available on text selection", 
"description": "I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions seem to be distributed based on personal preference, which is confusing for users. It is not clear why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch views in order to access certain actions.", 
"OB": "The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' should be easily accessible on text selection, without the need to switch to the Outline view. All relevant actions should be available in the editor or a global menu, such as the Edit menu.", 
"EB": "I expected the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' to be available directly on the text selection, either in the context menu or via the Edit menu.", 
"SR": "Please make sure that all actions, including 'Add Javadoc Comment', are accessible to users when they select text. These actions should be available in the context menu and/or the Edit menu."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '7330', 'title': 'Bug 7330Make more actions available on text selection', 'description': 'Bug 7330Make more actions available on text selection I could not find the action "Add Javadoc Comment" until I switched to theOutline view. in the Edit (or some other global) menuI think currently we distribute the actions on a personal taste basis. Thisshould be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the contextmenu and some are not (OKnot all need to be in the context menu but all mustbe reachable from the editor e.g. It is not acceptable to forceusers to switch the view. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'I expected the action to be1. ', 'SR': 'via Edit menu). '}
